reviewText: This is a collection of lesser known musicals. If you enjoy the Hollywood musical there are some good things in here. Royal Wedding has Astaire's famous ceiling and walls dance sequence. Happy Go Lovely is a mild little movie with gorgeous Vera-Ellen who was one of the very best dancers in the business. Anyway, some big names in some of their rarer efforts. Worth a try if you like the genre.

CONTENTS of BROADWAY'S BEST 4 Movie Pack: HAPPY GO LOVELY-- Stodgy bachelor greeting card company owner meets several ladies from a travelling actor's group and falls in love with one of them. ROYAL WEDDING-- A pleasant Technicolor MGM musical that contains the famous trick sequence of Fred Astaire dancing on walls and ceiling. TILL THE CLOUDS ROLL BY-- Hollywood's tribute to Jerome Kern and his many classic songs and showtunes. THE PERILS OF PAULINE-- Good comedic cast in this story of a garment worker whose brief stage career leads her to Hollywood as a star of a silent screen serial. GREAT LITERATURE ON FILM 4 Movie Pack (also from BCI / Eclipse) includes adaptations of Fitzgerald, Maugham, Rostand and Bront. BRENTWOOD's 4-fers are nicely priced movie bundles. Video and sound quality of these digitally unrestored public domain films is generally fine. Discs are dual-side recorded. . Parenthetical numbers preceding titles are 1 to 10 viewer poll ratings found at a film resource website. (6.4) Happy Go Lovely (UK-1951) - David Niven/Vera Ellen/Cesar Romero (6.2) The Perils of Pauline (1947) - Betty Hutton/John Lund/Billy De Wolf/William Demarest/William Farnum/Chester Conklin/'Snub' Pollard/James Finlayson (6.6) Royal Wedding (1951) - Fred Astaire/Jane Powell/Peter Lawford (6.4) Till the Clouds Roll By (1946) - June Allyson/Van Heflin /Judy Garland/Lena Horne/Van Johnson/Tony Martin/Dinah Shore/Frank Sinatra/Cyd Charisse/Angela Lansbury

A previous review of this DVD list the 4 movies as Royal Wedding,
Perils of Pauline, You Were Never Lovlier and The Pajama Game
this is not correct, the 4 movies are Royal Wedding,Perils of Pauline
Till the Clouds Roll By and Happy go :Lovely.
Happy go Lovely is an excellent color print and of all the releases of
Till the Clouds Roll By this is the best print that I have purchased although
in no way the excellent quality of the MGM video released, hopefuly one
day MGM may consider a DVD release
